subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Carry each others burdens, and in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ. (Galatians 6:2)
reflection: God has not called us to see THROUGH each other, but to see each other through
prayer: Lord help me to be less judgmental and help me to help a friend in need in Jesus name Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR THE DAY:

_"Carry each others burdens, and in this way _

_you will fulfill the law of Christ." _(Gal. 6:2) NIV

THOUGHT FOR THE DAY:

God has not called us to see THROUGH each other,

but to see each other through.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Lord help me to be less judgmental and help me to

help a friend in need--in Jesus name Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is freedom." (2 Corinthians 3:17)
reflection: By trusting Christ we are loved, accepted, forgiven, and freed to live for Him.
prayer: Dear Lord we thank You that through Your Holy Spirit You provide freedom from sin and condemnation. We pray for Your comforting hand upon those who lost loved ones in Vagus. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is freedom."_

_ _(2 Cor. 3:17)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY;

By trusting Christ we are loved, accepted, forgiven,

and freed to live for Him.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord we thank You that through Your Holy Spirit

You provide freedom from sin and condemnation.

We pray for Your comforting hand upon those who lost

loved ones in Vagus. Amen.

(sorry if you never received a devo. for Mon. Nov. 2)

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "FOR TO ME, TO LIVE IS CHRIST." (Philippians 1:21) NIV
reflection: For a Christian our purpose in life is to speak out boldly for Christ, and to become more like Him.
prayer: Dear Lord, I pray that I would be more sensitive to Your Spirit's guidance so that I would be more bold in my witness for You. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"FOR TO ME, TO LIVE IS CHRIST." _(Phil. 1:21) NIV

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

For a Christian our purpose in life is to speak out boldly

for Christ, and to become more like Him.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord, I pray that I would be more sensitive to Your

Spirit's guidance so that I would be more bold in my witness

for You. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Show me unfailing kindness like that of the Lord. (I Samuel 20:14) NIV
reflection: Kindness is a language which the deaf man can hear and the blind man can read.
prayer: Dear Lord of all mercy and love, instill in me a love which I can share with those who are hurting. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Show me unfailing kindness like that of the Lord._

(I Sam. 20:14) NIV

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Kindness is a language which the deaf man can

hear and the blind man can read.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord of all mercy and love, instill in me a love

which I can share with those who are hurting. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Let us do good to all people." (Galatians 6:10)
reflection: Paul challenges us to keep doing good and to trust God for the results. In due time, we will reap a harvest of blessing.
prayer: Dear Lord I thank You for Your Spirit's guiding hand. Help me to remain faithful even when I am attacked while doing good. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Let us do good to all people." _(_ _Gal 6:10) NIV

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Paul challenges us to keep doing good and

to trust God for the results. In due time, we

will reap a harvest of blessing.

TODAYS PRAYER:

Dear Lord I thank You for Your Spirit's guiding hand.

Help me to remain faithful even when I am attacked while

doing good. .Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "The godly give good advice to their friends, the wicked lead them astray." (Proverbs 12:26)
reflection: The righteous are the royalty of this world. It is they who should be followed. But in this world of appearances the wicked seem to have a larger following.
prayer: Dear Lord help me to stay on the path of righteousness please forgive me when I stumble. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"The godly give good advice to their friends,_

_the wicked lead them astray." _(Pro. 12:26)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The righteous are the royalty of this world.

It is they who should be followed. But in this

world of appearances the wicked seem to have

a larger following.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord help me to stay on the path of righteousness

please forgive me when I stumble. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Give thanks onto the Lord, for He is good. His faithful love endures forever" (Psalm 107:1)
reflection: "Has the Lord redeemed you? Then speak out!" God has done so much for us, and we have so much to thank Him for.
prayer: I thank You Lord that no matter how extreme the calamity in my life is, You are able to help me. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Give thanks onto the Lord, for He is good. _

_His faithful love endures forever" _(Ps. 107:1)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

"Has the Lord redeemed you? Then speak out!"

God has done so much for us, and we have so

much to thank Him for.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

I thank You Lord that no matter how extreme the calamity

in my life is, You are able to help me. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Praise the Lord! Happy are those who fear the Lord. (Psalm 112:1a)
reflection: Many blessings are available to us--honor, prosperity, security, freedom from fear, IF we fear the Lord and delight in obeying His commands.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father I thank You for the many blessing You have placed in my life. My family, friends, and the freedoms we have in this country. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_Praise the Lord! Happy are those who fear the Lord._

_ _ (Ps. 112:1a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Many blessings are available to us--honor, prosperity,

security, freedom from fear, IF we fear the Lord and

delight in obeying His commands.

PRAYER FOR TODAY

Dear Heavenly Father I thank You for the many blessing

You have placed in my life. My family, friends, and the

freedoms we have in this country. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "For as man are led by the Spirit of God, they are sons of God." (Romans 8:14)
reflection: There is one characteristic quality of all who are truly born again. That quality is that in their thoughts, behavioral patterns, and lifestyles they are constantly and habitually led by the Spirit of God.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, may Your long-suffering, gentleness, goodness, and meekness be obvious in my heart so that I may become more like You. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"For as man are led by the Spirit of God,_

_they are sons of God." _(Ro. 8:14)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

There is one characteristic quality of all who are truly

born again. That quality is that in their thoughts, behavioral

patterns, and life-styles they are constantly and habitually

led by the Spirit of God.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, may Your long-suffering, gentleness,

goodness, and meekness be obvious in my heart so that I may

become more like You. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Having the same spirit of faith, we also believe." (2 Corinthians 4:13a)
reflection: Faith is a fruit of the Spirit, and leads the seeking soul to depend on God alone. The whole life of a Christian each day is a faith life which clings to God waiting on what He has promised.
prayer: Dear Lord, grant the fruits of the Spirit in my inner life so that they will be seen in all that I do today. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Having the same spirit of faith, _

_we also believe." _(2 Cor. 4:13a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

_Faith_ is a fruit of the Spirit, and leads the seeking

soul to depend on God alone. The whole life of a

Christian each day is a faith life which clings to God

waiting on what He has promised.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord, grant the fruits of the Spirit in my inner

life so that they will be seen in all that I do today. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Keep alert and pray." (Matthew 26:41a)
reflection: The way to overcome temptation is to keep alert and pray. Because temptations strike where we are most vulnerable, we can't resist it alone. prayer is essential because God's strength can shore up our defenses and defeat Satan's power.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, let Your Holy Spirit teach me that the most important, the most blessed, and the most profitable time of the whole day is the time I spend alone with You. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Keep alert and pray." _(Mt. 26:41a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The way to overcome temptation is to keep alert and pray.

Because temptations strike where we are most vulnerable,

we can't resist it alone. prayer is essential because God's

strength can shore up our defenses and defeat Satan's power.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, let Your Holy Spirit teach me that the

most important, the most blessed, and the most profitable time

of the whole day is the time I spend alone with You. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "The Word of God is full of living power. It is sharper than the sharpest knife." (Hebrews 4:12a)
reflection: The demands of God's Word require decisions. We must not only listen to the Word; we must also let it shape our lives.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You although my heart seems cold and dead, Your Word is working in me the character promised in Your Word. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"The Word of God is full of living power._

_It is sharper than the sharpest knife." _(Heb. 4:12a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The demands of God's Word require decisions.

We must not only listen to the Word; we must

also let it shape our lives.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You although my heart

seems cold and dead, Your Word is working in me the

character promised in Your Word. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Let us draw near to God with a sincere heart in full assurance of Faith." (Hebrews 10:22) NIV
reflection: We have significant privileges associated with our new life in Christ. (1) We have personal access to God through Christ--(10:22) (2) We may grow in faith, overcoming doubts and questions--(10:23) (3) We may joy encouragement from one another--(10:24) (4) We may worship together--(10:25)
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, Help me to always draw near to You with full assurance that You will always hear my prayers answering them in such a way that is best for me. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Let us draw near to God with a sincere heart_

_in full assurance of Faith." _(Heb. 10:22) NIV

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

We have significant privileges associated with our new life in
Christ.

(1) We have personal access to God through Christ--(10:22)

(2) We may grow in faith, overcoming doubts and questions--(10:23)

(3) We may joy encouragement from one another--(10:24)

(4) We may worship together--(10:25)

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, Help me to always draw near

to You with full assurance that You will always hear

my prayers answering them in such a way that is best

for me. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Whatever you do or say, let it be as a representative of the Lord Jesus Christ." (Colossians 3:17a)
reflection: What Paul is saying in this verse is; as Christians we are to bring honor to Christ in very aspect and activity of our daily living. Remember as a Christian we are to represent Christ in all that we do and say.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, help us as Christians to be mindful of the awesome responsibility we have been given to be representatives of our Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Whatever you do or say, let it be as a_

_representative of the Lord Jesus Christ."_

_ _(Col. 3:17a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

What Paul is saying in this verse is; as Christians

we are to bring honor to Christ in very aspect and

activity of our daily living. Remember as a Christian

we are to represent Christ in all that we do and say.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, help us as Christians to be

mindful of the awesome responsibility we have been

given to be representatives of our Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "The blessings of the Lord makes a person rich, and He adds no sorrow with it." (Proverbs 10:22)
reflection: God supplies most people with the personal and financial abilities to respond to the needs of others. BUT wealth is a blessing ONLY if we use it in the way God intended.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, let it be my earnest desire and prayer that I use my many blessing in accordance with Your will. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY.

_"The blessings of the Lord makes a person rich,_

_and He adds no sorrow with it."_ (Pro. 10:22)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

God supplies most people with the personal and

financial abilities to respond to the needs of others.

BUT wealth is a blessing ONLY if we use it in the

way God intended.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, let it be my earnest desire and

prayer that I use my many blessing in accordance with

Your will. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "But you, dear friends, must continue to build your lives on the foundation of your holy faith. And continue to pray as you are directed by the Holy Spirit". (Jude 1:20)
reflection: To pray as we are "directed by the Holy Spirit" means to pray in the power and strength of the Holy Spirit. He prays for us (Romans 8:26, 27). Opens our mind to Jesus (John 14:26). And teaches us about Him (John 15:9, 10).
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, it is only through the blessed nearness of Your Spirit that I am able to abide in Your love at all times. That I can pray without ceasing, with full dependence on You. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"But you, dear friends, must continue to build your lives_

_ on the foundation of your holy faith. And continue to pray _

_as you are directed by the Holy Spirit". _(Jude 1:20)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

To pray as we are "_directed by the Holy Spirit" means to pray _

in the power and strength of the Holy Spirit. He prays for us

(Ro. 8:26, 27). Opens our mind to Jesus (Jn. 14:26).

And teaches us about Him (Jn. 15:9, 10).

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, it is only through the blessed nearness

of Your Spirit that I am able to abide in Your love at all times.

That I can pray without ceasing, with full dependence on You. .
Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Always be joyful -- Keep on Praying -- No matter what happens, always be thankful, for this is God's will. (I Thessalonians 5:16,17,18a)
reflection: Our joy, prayers, and thankfulness should not fluctuate with our circumstances or feeling. Obeying these three commands--be joyful--keep on praying--and be thankful, often goes against our natural inclinations. When we make a conscious decision to do what God says, we will begin to see people and our circumstances in a new perspective.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, help me to learn that those who have persevered before You, are those who have had the greatest power in prayer. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE OF TODAY:

Always be joyful -- Keep on Praying -- No matter what

happens, always be thankful, for this is God's will.

(I Thess. 5:16, 17, 18a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Our joy, prayers, and thankfulness should not fluctuate

with our circumstances or feeling. Obeying these three

commands--_be joyful--keep on praying--and be thankful,_

often goes against our natural inclinations.

When we make a conscious decision to do what God says,

we will begin to see people and our circumstances in a new

perspective.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, help me to learn that those who have

persevered before You, are those who have had the greatest

power in prayer . Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "May the communion of the Holy Spirit be with you." (2 Corinthians 13:13)
reflection: As a child of God there should be no selfishness and self-interest that seeks its own welfare. In heaven there is an eternal fellowship of love between Father and Son through the Spirit. Do we really long to be filled with the Spirit?
prayer: Dear heavenly Father, help us to offer ourselves to You, asking You to grant us the fellowship of the Holy Spirit with all members of Christ's body. (the Church) Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"May the communion of the Holy Spirit be with you."_

_ _(2 Cor. 13:13)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

As a child of God there should be no selfishness and

self-interest that seeks its own welfare.

In heaven there is an eternal fellowship of love between

Father and Son through the Spirit. Do we really long to

be filled with the Spirit?

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear heavenly Father, help us to offer ourselves to You,

asking You to grant us the fellowship of the Holy Spirit

with all members of Christ's body. (the Church) Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "If you look for me in earnest, you will find me when you seek me." (Jeremiah 29:13)
reflection: As a child of God, the Holy Spirit long to possess you completely. Take time to cast yourself in complete dependence on the word of His promise.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I know that Your Holy Spirit longs to possess me entirely, so I cast myself in complete dependence on the word of Your promise to allow Your work to begin in me. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"If you look for me in earnest, you will find me_

_when you seek me." _(Jer. 29:13)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

As a child of God, the Holy Spirit long to possess you

completely. Take time to cast yourself in complete

dependence on the word of His promise.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, I know that Your Holy Spirit

longs to possess me entirely, so I cast myself in

complete dependence on the word of Your promise

to allow Your work to begin in me. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Think clearly and exercise self-control. Look forward to the special blessings that will come to you at the return of Jesus Christ. (I Peter 1:13)
reflection: The imminent return of Christ should motivate us to live for Him. This means being mentally alert ("Think clearly"), disciplined ("exercise self-control"), and focused ("look forward"). Are you ready to meet Christ?
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, may I continually be found to be faithful abiding in You. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY

_"Think clearly and exercise self-control. Look forward to_

_the special blessings that will come to you at the return_

_of Jesus Christ. _(I Pet. 1:13)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The imminent return of Christ should motivate us to live for Him.

This means being mentally alert ("Think clearly"), disciplined

("exercise self-control"), and focused ("look forward"). Are you

ready to meet Christ?

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, may I continually be found to be

faithful abiding in You. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Paul writes: "I advise you to walk according to your new life in the Holy Spirit." (Galatians 5:16a)
reflection: The word "walk" reminds us of daily life with those around us. The Christian walk and conversation must follow the leading of the Spirit AND be by the Spirit.
prayer: We thank You Heavenly Father, continually for this Divine Leader who gives us daily renewal from heaven and enables us to walk and to live in Christ Jesus. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

Paul writes: _"I advise you to walk according to_

_your new life in the Holy Spirit." (_Gal. 5:16a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The word "walk" reminds us of daily life with those

around us. The Christian walk and conversation must

follow the leading of the Spirit AND be by the Spirit.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

We thank You Heavenly Father, continually for this

Divine Leader who gives us daily renewal from heaven

and enables us to walk and to live in Christ Jesus . Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "If you love Me Keep My commandments. And I will ask the Father, and He will give you another Counselor." (John 14:15, 16)
reflection: The Lord tells us here on what condition He will send the Spirit--The condition is reasonable and just, that as far as we have kept the commandments through the Spirit, the Spirit will be granted to us in fuller measure.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, it is my greatest wish to do Your will always. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

"_If you love Me Keep My commandments._

_And I will ask the Father, and He will give _

_you another Counselor." _(Jn. 14:15, 16)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The Lord tells us here on what condition He will send the

Spirit--The condition is reasonable and just, that as far as

we have kept the commandments through the Spirit, the

Spirit will be granted to us in fuller measure.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, it is my greatest wish to do

Your will always. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Enter His gates with thanksgiving; go into His courts with praise. Give thanks to Him and bless His name. (Psalm 100:4)
reflection: God alone is worthy of being worshiped. What is your attitude toward worship? Do you willingly and joyfully come into His presence, or do you just go through the motions, reluctantly going to church?
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You for Your grace and mercies which are new every day, Help me to begin each day with an attitude of worship in my heart. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_" Enter His gates with thanksgiving; go into_

_His courts with praise. Give thanks to Him_

_and bless His name. _(Ps. 100:4)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

God alone is worthy of being worshiped. What is

your attitude toward worship? Do you willingly and

joyfully come into His presence, or do you just go

through the motions, reluctantly going to church?

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You for Your grace and

mercies which are new every day, Help me to begin each

day with an attitude of worship in my heart. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Look forward to the special blessing (grace) that will come to you at the return of Jesus Christ." (I Peter 1:13b)
reflection: What Peter means is, we should live with our expectation fixed upon the special blessing that is on its way now, and will arrive in the revelation of Jesus Christ.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I have done nothing to deserve any "Special Blessing" BUT because of Your mercy and "Grace" I look forward to the imminent return of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Look forward to the special blessing (grace) that _

_will come to you at the return of Jesus Christ."_

_ _(I Pet. 1:13b)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

What Peter means is, we should live with our expectation

fixed upon the special blessing that is on its way now, and

will arrive in the revelation of Jesus Christ.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, I have done nothing to deserve

any "Special Blessing" BUT because of Your mercy and

"Grace" I look forward to the imminent return of our

Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Pour out your heart to Him, for God is our refuge." (Psalm 62:8b)
reflection: Beware of becoming overly discourage about yourself; you are commanded to put your trust in God and not yourself.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, help me to remember that the Scriptures tell us to; "Trust in the Lord with all your Heart and to not lean on your own understanding. ". Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

"_Pour out your heart to Him, for_

_God is our refuge."_ (Ps. 62:8b)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Beware of becoming overly discourage about

yourself; you are commanded to put your trust

in God and not yourself.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, help me to remember

that the Scriptures tell us to; "_Trust in the Lord_

_with all your Heart and to not lean on your own _

_understanding.". Amen. _

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "The fear of the Lord is the begging of wisdom." (Proverbs 1:7)
reflection: In this age of information, knowledge is plentiful, but wisdom is scarce. Wisdom means far more than simply knowing a lot. Trust in God--He will make you truly wise.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, I seek true wisdom, so I seek to be more sensitive to Your Holy Spirit's leading. Amen
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"The fear of the Lord is the begging of wisdom."_

(Pro. 1:7)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

In this age of information, knowledge is plentiful,

but wisdom is scarce. Wisdom means far more than

simply knowing a lot. Trust in God--He will make

you truly wise.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, I seek true wisdom, so I seek

to be more sensitive to Your Holy Spirit's leading. Amen

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: For the Lord grants wisdom! From His mouth comes knowledge and understanding. (Proverbs 2:6)
reflection: God gives wisdom and victory to the godly but not to those drifting through life or acting irresponsibly with His gifts and resources.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, Keep me from pride and greed. Guide and reward my sincere and persistent search. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"For the Lord grants wisdom! From His mouth comes_

_knowledge and understanding. ._(Pro 2:6)

THOUGHTS FOR TODAY:

God gives wisdom and victory to the godly but not

to those drifting through life or acting irresponsibly

with His gifts and resources.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, Keep me from pride and

greed. Guide and reward my sincere and persistent

search. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: Follow the steps of a good man, and stay on the paths of the righteous. For only the righteous will live in the land. (Proverbs 2:20, 21a)
reflection: The greatest blessing is reserved for those who faithfully obey God's commandments. (Genesis 17:8; Deuteronomy 4:1; Jeremiah 23:5, 6; Matthew 5:5).
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, make me appreciative every day of Your many blessings. Let me count them one by one with a grateful heart. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

"Follow the steps of a good man, and stay on the paths

of the righteous. For only the righteous will live in the land.

(Pro. 2:20, 21a)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

The highest of all blessings is reserved for those who obey

faithfully--God's commandments--(Gen. 17:8; Deut. 4:1;

Jer. 23:5, 6; Mt. 5:5).

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, make me appreciative every day of

Your many blessings. Let me count them one by one with

a grateful heart. Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Whosoever love God must also love his brother." (I John 4:12)
reflection: Lets try to follow the Savor's steps; lets remember all day long; that we are to love every one that we meet as our brother in the sight of God.
prayer: Dear Heavenly Father, help me walk in Your sight in accordance with Your will. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Whosoever love God must also love_

_his brother." _(I Jn. 4:12)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Lets try to follow the Savor's steps; lets

remember all day long; that we are to love

every one that we meet as our brother in

the sight of God.

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Heavenly Father, help me walk in

Your sight in accordance with Your will.

Amen.

subject: thoughts to live by
verse: "Jesus came to take away our sins, for there is no sin in Him." (I John 3:5)
reflection: Because Jesus lived a perfect life and sacrificed Himself for our sins, we CAN BE completely forgiven. WE CAN look back to His death for us and know that we need never suffer eternal death (I Peter 1:18-20)
prayer: Dear Lord, I thank You for the gift of eternal life that is ours when we confess our sins, and believe in Your finished work on the cross. Amen.
original_content:
VERSE FOR TODAY:

_"Jesus came to take away our sins,_

_for there is no sin in Him." _(I Jn. 3:5)

THOUGHT FOR TODAY:

Because Jesus lived a perfect life and sacrificed Himself

for our sins, we CAN BE completely forgiven. WE CAN

look back to His death for us and know that we need

never suffer eternal death (I Pet.1:18-20)

PRAYER FOR TODAY:

Dear Lord, I thank You for the gift of eternal life that

is ours when we confess our sins, and believe in Your

finished work on the cross. Amen.
